name: Finding Earth Beta
description:
Finding Earth

The game is about a Ufo that faces many obstacles Finding Earth and simulates the difficulty of flying a ufo through space debris.

This is a Beta game that I plan on updating when I can but school makes it hard to cosistantly post so stay toned. currently it only contains 10 levels but i plan on adding more features and mechanics.If you find any bugs, glitches or have any suggestions feel free to post them in the comments

Planned additions:

1.Boss level

2.More levels

3.More detail to levels

4.Save feature

and lots more too come
